data.title: MicroStrategy CEO says Bitcoin will be volatile, but it will 'go up forever'
data.text: Michael Saylor, MicroStrategy chairman and CEO, joins 'Squawk on the Street' to discuss his outlook on Bitcoin in the next 12 months.

data.title: Peter Thiel: High Bitcoin Prices Are Proof of US Inflation
data.text: The PayPal co-founder and venture capitalist billionaire Peter Thiel has claimed that rising bitcoin (BTC) prices are proof that inflation has taken hold in the United States economy.

data.title: Peter Thiel Calls Bitcoin Surge Sign of a “Crisis Moment”
data.text: Peter Thiel says high Bitcoin prices indicate inflation troubles.

data.title: Anonymous Bitcoin Whale Just Moved $617M Worth Of BTC Off Coinbase
data.text: What happened: A Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) whale just sent $616,565,264 worth of Bitcoin off Coinbase. The BTC address associated with this transaction has been identified as: 1PfaYUUy9pTFNVarYxByfUZ8Uh5pDuXZrU.

data.title: Bitcoin whale indicator detects multi-month accumulation trend as BTC eyes $67K-retest
data.text: The "Whales Supply Shock" metric has been pretty accurate in detecting Bitcoin market tops.

data.title: Crypto Fund Inflows Slow After Record Jolt From Bitcoin Futures ETF
data.text: The majority of inflows were bitcoin-related, with a total of $269 million pumped into investment funds focused on the largest cryptocurrency.

data.title: Peter Thiel Sees High Bitcoin Price as Sign of Real Inflation
data.text: Billionaire Peter Thiel regrets not buying more Bitcoin when it was cheaper

data.title: Genesis Digital Expands in US With 300MW Bitcoin Mining Facility in Texas
data.text: Genesis is building a new bitcoin mining facility to expand its North American operations using power partially from renewable energy sources.

data.title: Fortress Purchases 4,500 Bitcoin Mining Machines From Bitmain
data.text: The purchase will more than triple Fortress' hashrate to 645 PH/s.

data.title: NYDIG acquires Bitcoin micropayments firm Bottlepay
data.text: Former Goldman Sachs partner NYDIG partook in Bottlepay's seed funding round in March 2021.

data.title: Bitcoin ‘Moonvember' begins as data shows November is best month for S&P 500
data.text: It may turn out to be a race to the finish for both traditional and crypto markets, if historical data is anything to go by.

data.title: 'Uptober' closes at record high in best month of 2021 — 5 things to watch in Bitcoin this week
data.text: October 2021, with 40% gains, becomes the best for Bitcoin price action since December 2020, even beating the Q1 run.

data.title: How Bitcoin Miners Have Reinvigorated This Rural American Town
data.text: A Texas town of 5,600 people is benefitting from the Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) mining boom that has the potential to transform its landscape.

data.title: PayPal Co-Founder Reveals The Reason Behind Increasing Bitcoin ($BTC) Price
data.text: Peter Thiel, the co-founder of Paypal in a recent statement claimed he knows what's driving Bitcoin price up this October. Thiel, the billionaire entrepreneur has been an avid Bitcoin proponent, and when the top cryptocurrency rose to a new all-time-high (ATH) in the second week of October, Thiel showed signs of FOMO claiming he was The post PayPal Co-Founder Reveals The Reason Behind Increasing Bitcoin ($BTC) Price appeared first on Coingape.

data.title: Industrial Bitcoin mining breathes new life into tiny Texan town
data.text: Major Bitcoin miners have set up shop in a former aluminium smelting plant in the small Texan town of Rockdale.

data.title: Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Increases for 8th Time Since China's Crypto Ban
data.text: Bitcoin appears to have fully shrugged off the China crypto ban as the network's mining difficulty records its eighth consecutive increase.

data.title: Bitcoin Volatility Retraces After Reaching Year-High, and Institutions May Be Main Reason for It
data.text: Bitcoin volatility goes down after receiving billions from institutional investors

data.title: Argentina's Regulator Considering Approving Bitcoin Futures
data.text: Argentina's largest futures market is seeking the blessing of the local securities regulator in order to get into Bitcoin

data.title: Venezuelan Authorities Seize More Than 100 Miners From Clandestine Bitcoin Mining Operation
data.text: Venezuelan authorities seized over a hundred mining machines in a residential area of a central state. According to reports, the mining farm was operating illegally without permits that the national cryptocurrency watchdog, Sunacrip, requires for these operations. The seizure was led by the national police, officers from the national power company, and personnel from Sunacrip. […]

data.title: Bitcoin miners score their second-highest month of revenue ever with $1.72 billion in October
data.text: Bitcoin miners hauled in $1.72 billion in revenue during October, new monthly data shows, the second-highest level on record. The post Bitcoin miners score their second-highest month of revenue ever with $1.72 billion in October appeared first on The Block.
